name: github-takeout
description: Hackable scripts to archive your GitHub data using GitHub's API: Download all your Gists, all starred Gists, all forked Gists, list of starred Repositories, CSV exports of Gists and more.

scripts.download-all: npm-run-all download-forked-gists download-my-gists download-starred-gists list-gists-with-files list-gists list-starred-gists-with-files list-starred-gists list-starred-repos

author: Arda <50584220+devarda@users.noreply.github.com>
